name: Grenade Volley
description:
Grab a friend online or onLAN and take them on in a fight. One on one, grenade launcher in hand, launching shots over a barrier until one of you falls.

My first proper game project! Took the time to properly learn the Godot Engine, started wanting to do a basic Worms/Scorched Earth style game and it evolved into a silly real-time thing. Was super fun to learn and hope you enjoy!

What's it got?
  • Host your own server
  • 3 stages (with more to come maybe?)
  • Precision and trickery
  • Goofy hand-drawn art
  • Playable on Steam Deck
How do I play?

Info on how to play/control the game is featured in the "Info" menu of the game!

On how to play online, the host will need to forward the port 34197 in order to be able to host a game. A version of the game that doesn't require this may come eventually. Otherwise, you can host a server for just yourself and throw some bombs around for fun :)

Alternatively, it should be possible to use LAN over the internet programs such as Hamachi to play.
